Interface InputEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface InputEventListener
Defines the contract for an event listener that handles various game input events.

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a down movement event for the active brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the down movement.
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and the updated view data.

    • onLeftEvent

      ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a left movement event for the active brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the left movement.
      Returns:
      ViewData representing the updated game state.

    • onRightEvent

      ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a right movement event for the active brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the right movement.
      Returns:
      ViewData representing the updated game state.

    • onRotateEvent

      ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a rotation event for the active brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the rotation.
      Returns:
      ViewData representing the updated game state.

    • onHardDropEvent

      DownData onHardDropEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a hard drop event for the active brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the hard drop.
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and the updated view data.

    • onHoldEvent

      ViewData onHoldEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles a hold event for the active brick, swapping it with the held brick.
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent containing details about the hold action.
      Returns:
      ViewData representing the updated game state.

    • createNewGame

      void createNewGame()
      Initiates a new game.
